definition: to oscillate without pause (idiom)/to fluctuate/(of thoughts) to wander/to waver
to swim/variant of 遊|游[you2]
to walk/to tour/to roam/to travel
surname You
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove
(negative prefix)/not/no
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: He is a man of unsteady mind, and acts by planets.
sentences.chinese: 他思想不稳，行为游移不定。

sentences.english: One of the Major Hinderance is "delay in decision making" that India has been experiencing since Indepdence.
sentences.chinese: 主要问题之一印度独立以来的“决策的游移不定。

sentences.english: The man hesitated then picked up the envelope and put it in his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 那个人初始有些游移不定，随后拿起信封揣进兜里。

sentences.english: He's still wavering between the 2 plans.
sentences.chinese: 他仍然在两个计划中游移不定。

sentences.english: These two sounds keep on vacillating.

definition: indecisive/wavering
to hesitate over what move to make (idiom); to waver/to shilly-shally
to drift without a resting place (idiom)/roving/errant/vagrant/erratic
to wander/to shift around/to waver/to vacillate
to hesitate
hesitancy/indecision/to waver
swiftly moving/fleet/to sway
to hesitate/indecisive
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); at a loss/in a hopeless situation
(idiom) to hesitate/to remain undecided
anxious and perplexed/uneasy and confused/suspicious and fearful
elusive/hard to pin down/enigmatic
to hesitate to move forward/to hesitate/to hold back
to draw back/to move back and forth/to hesitate/in an instant
variant of 踟躕|踟蹰[chi2 chu2]
to evade/to dodge (out of the way)
